turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want you to assist me in order I want you to assist me in ordering pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how many pizza would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I need three medium pizzas with thick crusts and meat lover's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so thats 3 medium meat lovers pizza with thick crust is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok with 3 medium meat lovers pizza with thick crust your total will be 60 dollars.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. your pizza has been ordered with local Bella Luna and will be ready for pick up in 30 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. All right. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you are welcome. have a nice day.
